name: Pixie & Dixie featuring Mr Jinks
overview: The crafty Mr. Jinks has captured Pixie & Dixie's mystical cousin and stolen the magical book of spells, in this fast moving arcade adventure. To make matters worse, Mr. Jinks, who "hates those meeces to pieces" is now using the book of spells to bring to life various household objects in a bid to catch Pixie & Dixie. To make sure the spells are not undone, Mr. Jinks has torn up the book and scattered the pages all over the house. Pixie & Dixie must find all the pages, while at the same time trying to avoid being caught, so their cousin can be released and normality restored.
